*div1 type="summary"* *p*Sam Sexton to Austin, May 9, 1825. Concerning land for Sexton and Morgan.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Alexandria*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-09-1825">9th May 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*my dear sir I shall be out with young *person_mentioned*Mr. Groce*/person_mentioned* when he returns the latter part of this month in order to locate the land granted to *person_mentioned*Sexton */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Morgan*/person_mentioned*, erect some *location_mentioned*buildings*/location_mentioned*, and make preparations to remove my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*the ensuing *date_mentioned n="Fall- 1825">fall */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1825">winter*/date_mentioned*. I shall come prepared to pay for the other Leage, and should be glad to secure *location_mentioned*2 or 3 three more Leagues*/location_mentioned* for my *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*whom I expect on from the *location_mentioned*north*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mr. Thomas Hooper*/person_mentioned* accompanies me, who will be ready to fulfill the engagements *person_mentioned*Mr. Morgan*/person_mentioned* made with you concerning the *location_mentioned*J league */location_mentioned*on the *location_mentioned*Brasos*/location_mentioned*—I am informed you intend visiting the *location_mentioned*interior */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Summer - 1825">summer*/date_mentioned*. I expect to arrive before your departure; if I should not, I hope you will have the business in such a train that my *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*can be surveyed and titles made out so that I can go on to build for the solo purpose of my journey this *date_mentioned n="Summer - 1825">summer*/date_mentioned* is to make preperations to remove my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*in the *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1825">winter*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. James Brown*/person_mentioned* accompanies me likewise, and it is of importance for us all to see you before your departure. I hope you will delay a few days on our account should any accident retard or journey.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sam Sexton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
